mapper.update: update article set view_count = view_count + #{count} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select distinct a.id, a.title, a.status, a.created, a.view_count, a.thumbnail, a.json_ext, a.summary, a.out_link, u.user_name from article a LEFT JOIN `user` u on a.create_user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN article_category_relation acr on acr.article_id = a.id LEFT JOIN article_tag_relation atr on atr.article_id = a.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
select ac.* from article_category_relation acr join article_category ac on acr.category_id = ac.id where acr.article_id = #{articleId}
select ac.* from article_tag_relation acr join article_tag ac on acr.tag_id = ac.id where acr.article_id = #{articleId}
select a.*, u.user_name, u.head_img from article a LEFT JOIN `user` u on a.create_user_id = u.id where a.id = #{id}

select DISTINCT a.id, a.title, a.status, a.created, a.view_count, a.thumbnail, a.summary, u.user_name as author from article_category_relation acr join article a on acr.article_id = a.id LEFT JOIN `user` u on a.create_user_id = u.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT count(a.id) as total_count, count(CASE WHEN DATE(updated) = CURDATE() THEN a.id ELSE NULL END) as today_count, COALESCE(sum(a.view_count), 0) as total_view_count, COALESCE(sum(CASE WHEN DATE(updated) = CURDATE() THEN a.view_count ELSE NULL END), 0) as today_view_count from article a where a.`status` = 'publish'
